title: Moonstruck, Vol. 1: Magic to Brew
description: Werewolf barista Julie and her new girlfriend go on a date to a close-up magic show, but all heck breaks loose when the magician casts a horrible spell on their friend Chet. Now it's up to the team of mythical pals to stop the illicit illusionist before it's too late.Collects issues 1 through 5.
author: Grace Ellis
